title: Sobhita Dhulipala Is All Smiles As She Poses With Naga Chaitanya On Makar Sankranti | Photo - News18
Movie Review: 'Wolf Man' is a toothless reboot that'll make you bark at the moon - Hindustan Times
summary:
Movie Review: 'Wolf Man' is a toothless reboot that'll make you bark at the moon

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The review discusses the Blumhouse film “Wolf Man,” portraying it as a significant disappointment. Set in rural Oregon, the story fails to deliver the horror expected from the classic monster, suffering from poor execution and a muddled narrative.

  • The film is a reboot of a classic monster movie but falls flat.
  • The script is criticized for cheap sentimentality and obvious reveals.
  • Christopher Abbott stars as Blake, who deals with horror amidst family drama.
  • The creature is largely unseen and underwhelming.
  • Afflicted by a body-horror transformation, Blake undergoes distressing changes.
“Wolf Man,” a Universal Pictures release in theaters Friday, is rated R for “bloody violent content, grisly images and some language.”

The review concludes that “Wolf Man” is a dull experience, deserving of no stars out of four.
newTitle: Movie Review: 'Wolf Man' is a toothless reboot that'll make you bark at the moon

  • 2004 – Varsham
  • 2005 – Nuvvostanante Nenoddantana

  • 2007 – Deshamuduru

  • 2009 – Arundhati

  • 2011 – Mirapakay
  • 2012 – Businessman

Sankranthi season is considered the biggest period for the Telugu Film industry, especially following the pandemic.

The composer of the Pushpa franchise, Devi Sri Prasad, has provided insights regarding the development of Pushpa 3. The team is currently reworking the story based on the success of Pushpa 2.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule has been a major box office success, grossing over ₹1,831 crore worldwide.
  • Sukumar is actively reworking the narrative for Pushpa 3, utilizing ideas from parts 1 and 2.
  • Audience reception has been remarkable, spanning various regions and languages including Telugu, Hindi, and Kannada.
“Based on the euphoria of Pushpa 2, Sukumar sir is working tirelessly with his passion... We have some fragments and ideas that will take shape as we move forward.” - Devi Sri Prasad

Pushpa 3 is eagerly anticipated following the massive success of its predecessors, although details remain sparse.

title: Raj Babbar’s daughter knew about his relationship with Smita Patil since she was 7: ‘My mother was unhappy about it’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Raj Babbar’s daughter knew about his relationship with Smita Patil since she was 7: ‘My mother was unhappy about it’

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interview, Juhi Babbar, daughter of actor Raj Babbar, discusses her father’s relationship with the late actress Smita Patil, recalling her childhood understanding of the complicated family dynamics.

  • Juhi Babbar learned about her father's love for Smita Patil at the age of seven.
  • She recalls how Smita made efforts to connect with her and her brother Arya.
  • Juhi sensed her mother Nadira's unhappiness amidst the relationship, but also recognized Smita's kindness.
  • Juhi feels no hesitation in accepting her stepbrother Prateik, calling him her brother.
  • Smita Patil passed away shortly after giving birth to Prateik in 1986.
“As a child, I knew this is the lady my father wants to be with, and he wants to make her his wife.” - Juhi Babbar

This reflection sheds light on the personal impacts of celebrity relationships, as Juhi navigates her memories of both her father and Smita Patil.
newTitle: Raj Babbar’s daughter reflects on his relationship with Smita Patil

title: Diljit Dosanjh Looks Helpless In Jail, Reads A Newspaper In New Photos From His Upcoming Movie - News18
summary:
Diljit Dosanjh Looks Helpless In Jail, Reads A Newspaper In New Photos From His Upcoming Movie

Publication Date: January 15, 2025 Source: News18

Punjabi superstar Diljit Dosanjh has released new pictures from his upcoming movie, ‘Punjab ’95’, where he portrays human rights activist Jaswant Singh Khalra, showcasing intense moments of his character's journey.

  • Diljit shares images of his character inside a prison and reading newspapers outside, highlighting the emotional depth of his role.
  • The teaser of the film is set to be released on January 17, coinciding with the release of Kangana Ranaut’s film, ‘Emergency’.
  • The film addresses historical events connected to former Indian Prime Minister Indira Gandhi and its aftermath.
  • ‘Punjab ’95’ has already faced censorship challenges, with 120 cuts proposed by the Central Board of Film Certification.
  • Despite the film's sensitive subject matter, Diljit’s popularity is expected to help it reach audiences.
“The police were accused of killing unarmed suspects in staged shootouts.”

The production highlights the profound impact of political turmoil on individuals and relationships, aimed at shedding light on past human rights abuses.
newTitle: Diljit Dosanjh's New Movie 'Punjab '95' Showcases Heartfelt Struggles

title: Marco Box Office Collection Day 26: Unni Mukundan Only 27 Lakh Away To Deliver Last Mollywood Hit Of 2024! - Koimoi
summary:
Marco Box Office Collection Day 26: Unni Mukundan Only 27 Lakh Away To Deliver Last Mollywood Hit Of 2024!

Date & Source: January 14, 2025 from Koimoi

Unni Mukundan starrer Marco continues to perform well at the box office, boosted by the Makar Sankranti holiday. As of Day 26, the film's total collection reaches 59.73 crore.

Budget & Recovery

The film was made on a budget of 30 crore and has garnered a remarkable 99.1% return on investment, nearing the hit label.

Key Box Office Details

  • Total needed for hit tag: 60 crore
  • Amount remaining: 27 lakh
  • Day 26 collection: 0.50 crore

Total Box Office Collection Breakdown

  • Week 1: 27.6 crore
  • Week 2: 16.3 crore
  • Week 3: 13.15 crore
  • 4th Tuesday: 0.50 crore

Total: 59.73 crore

Conclusion

With just 27 lakh to go, Marco is set to become the last Mollywood hit of 2024, highlighting the film's strong performance and audience engagement.
newTitle: Marco Box Office Collection Day 26: Unni Mukundan Close to Delivering Last Mollywood Hit of 2024
